about_the_game:
Overview


Based on the popular SCP mythos, build your own SCP Foundation and protect the world against dangerous anomalies while navigating the administration of your sites and protecting your personnel. Orchestrate multiple sites and manage containment breaches with on-site security staff and specialized MTF (Mobile Task Force) Units.

The Latest And Greatest Technology




From your very own Facility Management System, on your cutting edge CRT monitor control your foundation and issue construction orders, change site procedures, and manage the research (and containment) of your SCPs.

Grow Your SCP Foundation


Expand the staffing of your sites and ensure they live long enough to be promoted and improve their skill (increasing the funding you receive from research). Arm your Security Forces with various weapons and improve their armaments through technological progression. Defend against SCP Breaches, Test Subject Riots, and Raids. Create your own Mobile Task Force Units and designations that serve as specialized security that excel in a few activities.

Features:
  • Build your facilities with a large variety of modular hallways, rooms, and other segments to perfect your facility's design.
  • Manage hiring and staffing in your facilities with security, research, construction, and D-Class personnel.
  • Watch your sites work autonomously with your oversight and customization of their operating procedures.
  • Oversee the containment of numerous SCPs and deal with the repercussions of containment breaches.
  • Orchestrate multiple sites and the finances of your entire foundation, remember money keeps the lights on!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: These are estimates and may change before release.

short_description: An SCP Facility Management game with strong visual stylings that allows you to run your own SCP Foundation Sites, capture anomalies, hire staff to contain and research them, and recontain them when they escape. Orchestrate multiple sites and guide your clandestine organization to success!
